00040 const char* CTypeTokenizer::next()
00041 {
00042     if(raw_ == 0 || *raw_ == 0)
00043         return 0;
00044     unsigned int bc = ctype_->getByteCount(raw_);
00045     assert(bc > 0 && bc < BUFFER_SIZE);
00046 
00047     for(unsigned int i=0; i<bc; ++i)
00048         buffer_[i] = *(raw_+i);
00049 
00050     // append 0 as end of string
00051     buffer_[bc] = 0;
00052 
00053     // move to next character
00054     raw_ += bc;
00055     return buffer_;
00056 }
